pkgmetadata.longdescription: The package was developed to fit fit many growth curves obtained under different conditions. // The package was developed to fit fit many growth curves obtained under different conditions in order to derive a conclusive dose-response curve, for instance for a compound that potentially affects growth. grofit fits data to different parametric models (function gcFitModel) and in addition provides a model free spline fit (function gcFitSpline) to circumvent systematic errors that might occur within application of parametric methods.
